name: OnVehicleSirenStateChange
notes: This callback is only called when a vehicle's siren is toggled on or off, NOT when the alternate siren is in use (holding horn).
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a vehicle's siren is toggled.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that toggled the siren (driver).

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle of which the siren was toggled for.

params_body.name: newstate
params_body.description: 0 if siren was turned off, 1 if siren was turned on.

return_values:
1 - Will prevent gamemode from receiving this callback.

 0 - Indicates that this callback will be passed to the gamemode.

 It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_fn: GetVehicleParamsSirenState: Check whether a vehicle's siren is on or off.
